title: ComponentReference
description: A declarative placeholder in a parent component's named slot, pointing to another component to be rendered there. Unlike ComponentInstance (a concrete rendered occurrence), ComponentReference is a composition declaration that says 'render this component in this slot of the parent', analogous to the HTML slot element.

ref.description: SpecNodeId of the component (ux.librarycomponent or ux.componentinstance) to render in the slot.

variant.description: Optional design variant override for this reference (e.g., 'compact', 'expanded', 'readonly'). Must match a variant defined on the referenced component.

slot.description: Named slot in the parent component where this reference is placed. Slot names are defined by the parent LibraryComponent (e.g., 'header', 'actions', 'footer').
